title: Trump Escalates Travel Ban Case with High Court Request (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Escalates Travel Ban Case with High Court Request (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Greg Stohr, Bloomberg News Supreme Court reporter and co-host of Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law," discusses a request by the Trump administration for the Supreme Court to immediately reinstate the president's travel ban, which has been blocked by several lower courts. He speaks with Bloomberg's June Grasso and Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
